channel.title: AI-Pulse - Stock Market & Finance
channel.description: Stock Market & Finance news from AI-Pulse

item.title: Etsy is selling Depop to eBay at a markdown, in latest move to focus on basics. Both stocks are rallying.
item.description: Etsy on Wednesday said it was selling the online secondhand-clothing site Depop to eBay for around $1.2 billion, in an effort to focus more deeply on its main marketplace business.

item.title: ‘Magnificent Seven’ stocks rise — but hardly enough to reverse a brutal February
item.description: A violent rotation away from Big Tech stocks this year could hobble the S&P 500.

item.title: Asia stocks rise as tech gains offset rate uncertainty; ASX, KOSPI hit record high
item.description: Asia stocks rise as tech gains offset rate uncertainty; ASX, KOSPI hit record high

item.title: Will Microsoft’s stock finally rebound? A board member just bet $2 million on a turnaround.
item.description: There have been a few instances of insider purchases in the wake of the recent software selloff, with the latest coming from Microsoft director John Stanton.

item.title: Figma’s stock soars as AI earnings momentum helps ease investors’ doubts
item.description: Figma’s revenue grew 40% in the fourth quarter as net dollar retention rate increased to 136%

item.title: After record sales, murky forecast sinks Carvana’s stock
item.description: Shares of Carvana tumbled some 20% after hours on Wednesday, after the online used-car retailer’s outlook for the year ahead offered few specifics, following a year in which sales growth surged.

item.title: Palo Alto Networks’ stock falls after earnings. These analysts see a good chance to buy.
item.description: Some analysts encourage investors to look past a muddy outlook and focus on the company’s recent momentum and AI opportunity.
